alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Tift; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 11:40PM EDT until July 22 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... Tift County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 1230 AM EDT. * At 1140 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Poulan to 6 miles northeast of Doerun, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tifton, Sylvester, Omega, Norman Park, Poulan, Ty Ty, Unionville, Phillipsburg, Sumner, Ellenton, Minton, Eldorado, Scooterville, Anderson City, Tempy, Harding, Vanceville, Hillsdale, Cool Spring and Chula. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
